summary: Provides comprehensive test suites for the LEditsPP image‑editing pipelines built on Stable Diffusion and Stable Diffusion XL, covering fast unit tests with mocked components and slower integration tests with real models to validate inversion, batch inversion, warm‑up handling, and the core editing operation.
business_intent: Guarantee the correctness and robustness of the LEditsPP pipelines before deployment, enabling reliable AI‑driven image editing features for products that rely on Stable Diffusion models.
